column5: Firstly I'd like to say Merry Christmas to everyone.  Secondly I'd like to say I love ice fishing.  Caught 25 perch on Dec 24 and 25 again on Dec 26.  Caught 1 walleye Dec 24 and 1 again on Dec 26 (notice a pattern?)  The perch action is furious with a swedish pimple or a small shinner.  Caught the walleye with a swedish pimple both nights. It's not a monster but it's a good ice breaker.  Sorry for the crummy shots, first time using the BB camera.
Good stuff, congrats to you. Smart of you the bring light beer on thin ice......brilliant even....
looks like fun!  Thanks for the report!  Cheers!
Good job Rod Caster    Always cool to hook into ice breakers at this time of year Thanks for sharing Leechman
Awesome, WTG Rod Caster  I'm all set up to go now & my buddy has his shack out on Nosbonsing, he said we can go anytime    Ummmm, how about NOW?!?!?! LoL  Congratz on your catches
LOL Roy.  Nice fish,good for getting out.   Where are my royalties?
It was Lucky Lager...that makes me even smarter right....considering I got.....lucky
How the hell did i miss this post!!!!  WTG RC!  Perch in beer batter on the ice...great day out!
